channel.title: Illustrator on Aenism
channel.description: Recent content in Illustrator on Aenism

item.title: Make metaballs
item.description: The blobby shapes you see in the 37signals logo. They are called metaballs. It’s not a typo. You can’t eat them. 37signals logo It’s a common pattern in logos. The metaball shape is actually very easy to create in any vector software. Here’s how to do it in Illustrator using basic shapes and the Pathfinder tool.
